scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc --build && vite build && npx tailwindcss -i ./src/public/css/input.css -o ./dist/public/css/output.css --minify && cpx 'src/public/**' dist/public
scripts.dev: npm run clean && tsc --build && concurrently "vite build --watch" "cpx './src/public/**' ./dist/public --watch" "npx tailwindcss -i ./src/public/css/input.css -o ./dist/public/css/output.css --watch" "nodemon ./dist/index.js"
